thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com | 321 3
thread.title: dom

author: dom
title: dom
text: I never got my money or item when I ordered they said free shipping they wanted 1/5th the amount in taxs & fees I went back to the seller for a full refund & they refused I esacalted to dhgate who closed the case saying the seller had sorted but they hadn't after I didn't get my money back I went back for the goods from dhl but the where instructed by the seller to dispose of it they scammed me I thought there was buyer protection but there's not
